Row.Text: Tries to maximize [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes. Likes civilizations that trade with her, dislikes those who do not.
Tries to build up [ICON_Science] Science, and likes civilizations that also focus on [ICON_Science] Science. Dislikes those with low [ICON_SCIENCE] Science.
Will not attack neighbors unless they break a promise to him. Likes those who do not war with neighbors, dislikes those who do.
Wants to build the world's most dominant cavalry force. Likes those who do not compete in cavalry. Dislikes those who rival him in cavalry strength.
Tries to use as many corps and armies as possible and respects civilizations who follow his lead. Does not like civilizations who can't create corps or don't use them.
Tries to form multiple alliances and respects those who do likewise. Dislikes those with few alliances.
Tries to conquer neighboring civilizations, and likes civilizations that are not his neighbors (yet). Does not like his neighbors.
Tries to put high-level walls around her cities and respects civilizations who follow her lead. Does not like civilizations who fail to fortify their cities.

Tries to create and maintain a high degree of cultural loyalty. Dislikes civilizations that lose cities by failing to maintain the loyalty of their people, likes those that gain cities through loyalty.
